website_summaries.verdict: An affordable travel bottle warmer for hungry babies on the go.
pros: Heats via the warmth of boiling water
Very simple and easy to use
cons: The bottle has been known to leak

customer_reviews.title: Baby MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this amazing little travel bottle. I watched my sister struggle at every outing to warm her babies bottles on the go. We would be a restaurants and ask for hot water and a cup to place the bottle in and the food server ( if they weren’t a parent) never understood what she was asking for. This travel bottle is amazing I fill it up with my tea kettle before I leave my house and it stays warm all day. I’ve even used the water more than once!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda scharn

customer_reviews.title: I bought this so that I could warm up my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could warm up my baby's bottle while we were out. I was pleasantly surprised to see that boiling water remained hot 4 hours later. Although a bit heavy, it has been really helpful not to have to look for a hot water source when we are out. In addition, the container/cover make things a lot easier. Often, after I warm up the baby bottle, I will pour the water back into the thermos in case I need to warm up a bottle later on. It's not much different from a regular thermos, but with the container/cover that fits and screws right on top, it is extremely convenient.
customer_reviews.author: DL692

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t do reviews but this product is so horrible I just had to. What a piece of junk! It does NOT keep the water hot or warm. Tried to use it 3hrs after filling it with hot water and it did nothing because the water was luke warm. The water in the baby bottle wasn’t even that cold, it was only slightly below room temp. The cap where the water pours out of always has water trapped inside. No amount of shaking will get rid of all the water. Plastic and water = mold. Very unsanitary. Worst product design ever.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Cup is too wide
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Mine doesn’t leak or anything but i was expecting it to be able to warm at least 3 bottles . I use dr brown 4oz-8oz bottles and they are thin and long . The cup that comes with this is too wide and you have to pour half the boiled water from container in the cup to warm the bottle.. which is minor issue because i can just put a smaller cup in diaper bag . But the cup is pretty much useless unless you have thick short bottles or don’t mind using half your water supply. With a narrower cup the size of the bottle i can warm about 3-4 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kwayla

customer_reviews.title: Best Universal Warmer, and Storage for Filtered Hot Water
customer_reviews.text: Best warmer! Multiple uses that others can't handle. We take it every time we go out, and it's especially nice to have on our long trips out of state. I can pour in boiling water to thaw/warm breast milk, or use warm water to make formula. It can be used with any type of bottle including the Playtex Drop-ins or breast milk storage bags that the other warmers can't warm. The "warming carafe" is what sets it apart from every thermos, and is what makes it ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: KPREV

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, you have found it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be smaller but the size it perfect. You can take it anywhere and it's easy to use, I boil the water keep in in my nightstand, baby is only drinking 2 oz right now so I fill the bottle under an oz of hot water and fill the rest with room temperature water, put in the formula and bottle is ready for baby!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: So convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad I never had this for my 2 year old! Sooo convenient to use when out of the house! The water stays boiling hot. I use ready to feed formula and put it in a milk storage bag with ice packs in a cooler bag and bring this. I’m able to hear up the milk in 30 seconds! I’ve been able to even pour the water back in the thermos and reuse again for another bottle. I’ve never used it to make formula while out because we use ready to feed but to warm bottles, for me, it’s fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I really like this item!
customer_reviews.text: I only use it when I'm away from home but I love how long the water stays hot for. I've used it during camping trips, putting in hot water during the morning still keeps it boiling hot at night for me, the water does get warm the following morning after. If the water is really hot, I usually have to wait about 7 mins until food/milk is a good temperature to feed. I don't really like the bulk of it but it's still a fantastic item. As long as I have this item and dont lose the lid, I dont think I'll plan to order another warmer in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for travel... high quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Was taking a trip and going back and forth whether we should get one of these to have in order to heat up baby’s bottle. We bought and couldn’t be happier with our decision. This is a super high quality item— we boiled water one morning, put into thermos, removed some for use and left the remainder in overnight... and the night morning, when I went to pour out the water, it was still hot. Item is a bit heavy, but after using the product, I realize that it has to be since it’s made of such good material. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think.. just buy!
customer_reviews.text: I kept putting this in my shopping cart, then kept taking it out thinking i don't really need it... that i could just ask places for a cup of hot water and save my money. Then while out and about, i would find myself in need of hot water but wouldnt have access to any. Some restaurants also don't offer hot water (which i thought was so weird). Lots of milk went to waste... pretty much my whole supply (i ebf but have milk for when we are out ane about). I finally caved and bought it and IT MADE MY LIFE SO MUCH EASIER. Wish I would have just purchased it from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to warm up my bottles of breast milk on the go. I was skeptical of this but OMG it works perfectly! It held the water at the right temperature all day. When it came time to warm the bottle it for the job done very quickly. I use it with my Dr. Browns bottles. It is large and doesn’t fit in cup holders as a few others pointed out but it fit in my diaper bag/backpack just fine. Love it! Also, people who say it leaks didn’t read the instructions on how to lock the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Leaks Everywhere If It Is Not Upright!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a trip I was taking across country. When I got to the airport I went to a coffee shop and got hot water to put in the thermos for when we got onto the plane. I put the thermos (completely closed and cap screwed on) in the diaper bag. At the beginning of the flight I went to warm a bottle and it had leaked all over everything in my diaper bag. It was brand new and should not have leaked. I asked my sister if her travel bottle warmer (same one) leaked and she said it leaks everywhere so she only uses it at home when she can put it on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The premise of this product is great. Be aware of the lid
customer_reviews.text: The premise of this product is great. Be aware of the lid. There is a button on the top and whether it is pushed in or not, boiling hot water may pour out and scald your finger. I suffered from a second degree burn. There is insufficient information on whether the lid is truly opened or closed. I would never recommend this product and i'm terrified of using it. In addition, the product while closed, leaks and soaked my diaper bag. we discovered that there is a rubber insert that was incorrectly assembled causing the water to leak. Don't waste your money and instead purchase a decent thermos to bring along hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Preferred over electric warmer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and an electric bottle warmer for my mom when she's watching my daughter. Before, my mom was warming water up in a kettle and pouring into a bowl that held the bottle (breast milk). My mom loves this product so much more than the electric warmer and uses it both at home and on the go. She keeps hot water in the canister, ready at all times. The water is still steaming hours later. She found this product is so much faster than her previous method and still prefers it over the electric warmer. Its fast and there is no chance for the bottle to get overheated, as with the standard electric warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy
customer_reviews.text: I breastfeed so I needed something that will warm up my daughter milk when I’m the go. I always had to stop to buy a cup of hot water to warm her milk up, I seen this and thought what do I have to lose, when I receive my order my husband rolled his eyes at me and said it just wasting money until we went out to run errands and my daughter got hungry, I took out my tommie tippeeee and pour the water in the cup and writhing a few mins her milk was warm, he look at me and said damn this really does work. Lol so buy it mama/daddy it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with this bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this bottle warmer! So much so I buy it for every baby shower. The water stays hot enough for 2 bottles--my daughter eats every 3 hours. The 3rd bottle can be warmed but it just has to stay in a little bit longer. The inside of the white cup gets condensation every now and then but probably because as soon as I am done warming up my bottle, I pour the water back in and close it. I would recommend tipping the silver mug to let residual water pour out so it doesn't leak out and burn.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle warmer for on the go, that doesn’t have to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Boil some water, put it in the canister, later pour the water in the cylinder top and place the bottle inside. It’s quick, easy and safe. The canister is sturdy so you don’t have to worry about the hot water spilling out. It’s easy to pour as well so it can be done in the car without worrying about spilling it on yourself due to the safe proof design. The only disadvantage i can even think of is it won’t fit in a cup holder, but if it were that small it wouldn’t fit the bottle or over the canister. Overall the best bottle warmer for on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for warming up bottles when you are on the go!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle warmer because my wife and I were traveling to India with our 10 month year old. We were going to be out a lot and our current bottle warmer would not work in India because they are 220 V. This was great because we were able to take it on the plane and warm the bottles at the airport as well. The water stays hot almost 24 hours which exactly what we needed. This is a great travel warmer because you don't need electricity and the water will stay hot
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the water hot for an incredibly long time. Floating about 5oz of cold milk is a lot quicker to heat up than a bottle warmer...that’s after using an electric kettle to put boiling water in and then leaving it for a few hours to use for a night feed. We used this with our first and also tried the kiinde warmer and the first years 2-in-1 warmer but this is straight up faster as long as you can remember to heat up water! Worked perfectly with 8oz as well, and for traveling in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Weona

customer_reviews.title: I must have for moms and dads
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I wish I would have had it for my first child. It keeps water piping hot almost all day. My husband and I use it on the go and during the night. We are boiling the water and mixing it with the powder as advised by the pediatrician, so we need the heat up the cool milk at night and on the go. I just want to take the chill out of it. This is easy to use and I would recommend it for anyone who needs to heat up either formula or breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: HopefullyHelpful

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: A must have for bottle feeding on the go!! I’ve gotten so many compliments and people asking where to get this. It is pretty big, but for the price, it’s no brainer. I put 2 cups in microwave for 3 minutes and even 8 hours later it’s still warm! I use Dr. Browns bottles in it and it works like a charm. Takes practice to get timing right. No more worrying about where you’re going to find warm water in public.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great invention, handy to have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: Great invention for those finicky babies who need milk to be warmed. So often we don’t have access to hot water while we are out, this solves that issue! Thermos keeps water lit for hours, still has been steaming when we go to dump it out 4-5 hours later. Yes, you can essentially do the same thing with a thermos and a cup, here you are paying for the convenience of it being perfectly sized for portability - the thermos fits into the cup and screws tight. Also, tommee tippee bottles fit perfectly in it, not sure about other brands. You can get about 2 warm ups with one full thermos.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Life saving!
customer_reviews.text: We are constantly having to travel to doctors appointments for specialists with my daughter which take us far from home and require us to feed her on the go. This is a life saver. We used to try and warm her bottle under faucets with no luck and it would result in our daughter not wanting to eat her feeds. Now we just boil some hot water before we leave, pour it in the thermos and go. What a relief. Thank you Tommee Tippee!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I don’t have to wait forever for the bottle to heat up. Just boil some water (or heat water up in the microwave if you are pressed for time) pour it into the thermos and go. When you are ready to use the water just push the button on top of the thermos and pour it into the cup, then place bottle into the water. Water stays hot for hours! Bottle heated up within the time I changed my daughter’s diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it but it doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and how well it works but after some time about three months it started leaking. Also you have to be very careful with small children because this is really hot water and I can spell on them but the item does work very well and it’s convenient when you have frozen bags of breast milk and are traveling away from home. Maybe the two that I bought where does faulty or maybe they just last that long I’m not sure but for $15 I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Steele

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm even in freezing cold
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle warmer. My son is a preemie so we need to warm a lot of bottles as he needs his breast milk fortified with formula, and usually the milk we’re warming is refrigerated. We use this at home because we can boil the water once and reuse the same water 3-4 times before it loses its heat! We haven’t used it on the go yet but I can tell it will be convenient. The most amazing thing though, is that the thermos keeps the water super hot! My husband filled it with boiling water and put it outside in literally 0 degree weather for 2 hours, and the water stayed piping hot!! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Milk warmer for travel
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time to travel with a one year old in tow and she was breastfed. She was on her last few days of breastmilk and we have frozen breastmilk with us for the 6-hour trip aside from the time at the airport waiting. The hot water we kept lasted for a while and we asked the stewardess for a refill. It was convenient to bring this mini thermos milk warmer. The deep lid served as the container to hold the water and the bottle. Useful and convenient for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Abee

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver! It will hold water at a hot temperature for over 24 hours. I highly recommend getting this product if you pump and need to warm your breastmilk on the go. The button on the top is a little confusing. If you do not have it pressed in the water will leak out. It is also pretty bulky in size so can sometimes be awkward putting into a diaper bag. Overall, we got much use out of ours and I would buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! As an on-the-go breastfeeding mom, I tried several bottle warming products. Some took anywhere from 20-30 minutes to warm a bottle! Others were supposed to be quick, but did not warm the milk completely. I stumbled across this product and figured I would give it a try. It works! It heats the bottle quickly and is easy to use. I wish I had found it sooner. Great buy! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: So convenient for bottle babys
customer_reviews.text: Thia is great! It keeps the bottle water VERY hot! I’ve even left it in the car overnight and came out to hot water the next morning! Such a great product! I had one kid leak after I took the ring off to many times but I ordered another one because it’s so convenient. When you Was don’t take the ring off and that won’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle warmer!
customer_reviews.text: The water stays hotter than heck for definitely long enough. This is great for on the go. People complain that it's bulky, well yeah it needs to hold enough water to heat a bottle.. . And for those who complain this is just a thermos in a cup... Yep, I'd like you to find a thermos this size with this kind of top and a cup that fits it to take up less space, for the same price! The average thermos is well over $13. Highly recommend for all parents on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Clifford

customer_reviews.title: genius idea
customer_reviews.text: This has been the most handy thing I've gotten for baby. I boil water before I leave and pour it in here and it stays warm for hours on end. It's not terribly heavy, but does have a little weight to it once the water is added to it. The size is great though because I can fit it easily into my diaper bag or insulated bag with the milk. It washes easily and is incredibly handy on the go for heating water. If you are a parent on the go a lot I highly recommend this so you don't have to worry about hunting down hot water while you are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Marlana

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I poured boiling hot water in it in the morning (ended up not using it that trip), forgot about it and when I emptied it that night the water was STILL piping hot! It would have definitely warmed up my babies bottle still. This is a GREAT product! I am buying one for my BFF. One person said it was too big but I disagree. I thing the size is legit for what it does. It needs to hold water, keep it hot and the top has to be big enough to place most all bottles in.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Lorenzo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot!  Good option
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to us this we’ve been packing it for well over a month for emergencies when going out. The water was just as hot when I spilled it on myself in the car. Warmed bottle within 2 min from being cold. This was a glass bottle which warms much quicker than plastic. Glad I returned the Munchkin travel warmer- 20 min to warm and it’s plugged in?! To be fair if you have a nice thermos and a big cup to submerge bottle in that would be the equivalent of this however this is convenient with everything you need packaged in a nice smallish( pack of wipes) package.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Overrated-Think twice
customer_reviews.text: This product is overrated. It does not perform as good as expected. It doesn’t keep the water as hot as it claims. It only allows for two milk warm ups. I use dr.brown bottles and the baby is currently at 5 oz and I see my self only having enough to warm up two bottles. Not too convenient when baby drinks every 2 hours and are out doing errands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I love most Tommee Tippee products. This item included. The design is great and fits into my diaper bag with no leaks. I was surprised on how long it stays scolding hot. I used it after 8 hours and water temperature was still boiling hot. I'm sure it stays that way for much longer but I haven't had to used it past eight hours. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Tommee Tippee Travel Bottle Warmer. Price is right and works perfect. When I'm gone all day either grocery shopping or going to Dr. Appts this works so great for heating up my son's formula. My first son didn't care what temperature his formula was but my second son is very particular and it litterally saves my butt from melt downs. I put boiling water in this container before I leave the house and it stays hot all day. I've even forgot to empty it and it's still hot the next day. This is super easy to use and doesn't leak! I most definitely recommend this to anyone who needs to warm formula/milk up on the go!!
customer_reviews.author: Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: I go out with my daughter a lot, and she WILL NOT drink a bottle that isn't warm. We don't really use the bottle warmer the way you are supposed to. We fill it up with really hot water, and then bring some bottles of room temperature water and mix the hot with the room temp water as needed to make the bottle warm. It works perfect for that purpose and definitely kept the water hot/warm for the amount of time I was out which is sometimes 8-10 hours. I like it, and am glad I have it so I can leave the house more often for longer stretches of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing from beginning to end
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how much I hated this. The top is counter intuitive and new users burn themselves very easily. Then water gets trapped in the top so when you lock it closed and tip it scalding water comes out and burns you agian. Imy husband and i finally got used to it to avoid getting burnt, but i dont wabt something that can that easily leak near my daughter. And then last, it broke in like a month. Uggh
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: ... mine is 5 years old and although it works great but the upper white cover got old and dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: i have used a tommee tippee bottle warmer before and wanted to buy the same thing again as mine is 5 years old and although it works great but the upper white cover got old and dirty hence a new one. This one however is faulty as the top lid doesn’t screw on properly leaving leakes. The hot water spilled on me a several time so it wasn’t very pretty. I wonder if the quality has decreased over the years
customer_reviews.author: Proud Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can leak.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little smaller. It’s a little bulky for my diaper bag can get heavy. Also some water does leak after closing if you open cap to pour hot water back in container. I shake it off to make sure no water leaks in diaper bag other than that it serves its purpose. Water stays hot for up to around 12 hours depending of course of the temperature it’s in.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.A

customer_reviews.title: It's almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Let's be real--it's just a thermos, but it is very handy. The lid functions as the water holder. It does make my diaper bag much heavier than I would like but I don't need it often. In fact, we boil water in the morning and use it at home during the day. It does keep warm all day but after 8ish hours it takes longer to warm. The only reason I dock a star is because no matter what speed I stop pouring, hot water always runs down the side.
customer_reviews.author: cheluzal

customer_reviews.title: must for travel/bottle feeding
customer_reviews.text: you need this! basically an awesome thermos that holds hot hot water for hours (still hot when i dumped it out after 10hours) and the white cover is the cup you pour it into to warm your milk/formula whatever. it’s quick and easy, allows me to heat my baby’s milk without a fuss and fast. UPDATE: after 2 months of very light use (used maybe 6 times) and hand-washing ONLY; sadly this product is leaking. i have updated my review from 5 stars to 2. this leaked all over my diaper bag and i checked it over and over as to what could be wrong and i cannot find what is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mlt04

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be so great for on the go bottles. However, it was horrible. I tried using it two different ways to give the benefit of the doubt but it never kept the water hot enough to dissolve formula. I also tried putting boiling water in it and tried using it 3 hours after and it was mildly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Danorm

customer_reviews.title: Works well but stinks really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but REEKS of moth balls?? I've washed it, soaked in vinegar, and it seems to have helped but I can still smell it, especially when hot water is poured into it. I put boiling water into it at 7:30am and when I dumped it out at 12pm, it was still hot enough to burn me, so it does keep it really hot. I'd recommend warming your milk up in a glass bottle because boiling water is going to leech the chemicals from your plastic bottles into the baby's milk, or pour in warm water (not boiling hot).
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but needs a funnel
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about this at first but my husband really wanted to give it a go. The water really does stay scalding hot for hours. With that being said, make sure you bring a funnel to be able to pour the water back into the thermos for a couple reasons. 1) your water stays so hot, you could reuse it if need be and 2) what if you are in the car while feeding. That was the case for us and I wished I had a funnel. Now if I’m packing our bottle warmer, I’m packing a funnel too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS LEAKS LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: This started off as a great product that we loved...until it started leaking for no apparent reason. We first noticed a tiny bit of water had leaked out so we began putting the thermos in a large ziploc bag to prevent water from getting elsewhere in the diaper bag. A few days later we had a HUGE leak from the thermos and thankfully we had the thermos in a ziploc again, otherwise diapers, clothes, etc. would’ve been soaked in our diaper bag. We love every other Tommee Tippee product we have except for this one. I wouldn’t recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyanne Hettick

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water warm for 6+ hours - Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a road trip and it kept water warm for at least 6 hours. One thing to note that others have said on here - make sure you use the hot water to heat your bottle and not use the water to mix with formula. This is a great gift for someone with a newborn as sooner or later they will need to heat up milk/formula.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Smart and simple way to warm bottles on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I used to bring my own cup around that I could put hot water in to warm up bottles, but I’d have to find somewhere (a coffee shop or other restaurant) to give me hot water. This is SO MUCH EASIER. The thermos keeps the water HOT for a really long time and the outer cup that you pour the water in is huge, so there’s no splashing in a moving car and you can get enough water in there even with larger bottles to actually get your bottles warmed up in a decent amount of time. I’ll buy this as a gift for any of my new mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Sharrett

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between this and a regular bottle warmer. I read a lot of reviews and thought I would try this out. Overall, I am very satisfied with it! It's great for on the go anywhere (even a hungry baby in the middle of Macy's). It is a little heavy and bulky for the diaper bag, but that's to be expected. I did find it to work better if you actually put boiling water in instead of just really hot water, but it keeps it hot for a LONG time (we've even checked it at over 24 hours and it was still really warm). Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Complete life saver. I pour boiling water in it, use the same water about 3 times and it’s STILL hot. By use the same I mean pour water and heat a bottle then pour the water back into the container. The water stays so hot it takes seconds to heat a bottle. I use this all the time even when I’m home. So much faster then an electric warmer. Perfect for a day out. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but great
customer_reviews.text: This comes in handy for traveling and being out with a hungry baby! I filled the thermos with boiling water and it was still super hot hours later. It only took a few mins to warm up a bottle. I do wish it was dishwasher safe. I gave 4 stars only because its heavy when empty and only gets heavier when full.
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Sooo, the water does not stay hot for long. And it's too big I would say. Wish it was a little smaller =/. Also, the push button is so confusing. One time I thought that pressing down meant close and my whole diaper bag was soaked. I think I wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Areeba

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle warmer ever
customer_reviews.text: We had 3 different bottle warmers for our kids. This ended up being the one we used exclusively. Put scalding hot water in it, and you can defrost a completely frozen bottle of milk in a few minutes. Best part is if you're anywhere with a sink or at a restaurant, you can easily get new hot water for it. Super easy, super convenient and super effective!
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that it is bulky and heavy, it is great. It’s very well designed and I don’t think you can get the quality from a lighter smaller product. The thermos is amazing, steaming hot water for hours. Just be prepared to have a heavier diaper bag but if you mostly bottle feed, and like us, heat up bottles with breast milk, this really helps. I never have to worry about heating the milk bottles when we’re out.
customer_reviews.author: J valle

customer_reviews.title: this thing is great. we were looking for ways to warm a ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great. we were looking for ways to warm a bottle on the go and most required a car power socket and wrapping the bottle which takes forever when you have a screaming baby in your arms. we love this so much that we don't even use the home warmer anymore we just keep this filled 24/7. the water will stay warm for a really long time. we took this to someone's house and every time I used it I would just put the water we used to heat the bottle in the microwave for 30 seconds are refill the thermos. it lasted all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple thermos/cup concept, but it does the job. A little bulky, but again, does the job. Great price, easy to clean. We've had it leak a couple of times, but just a few drops and not enough to make us not like it. We've even used it at home, bedside for night feedings. Good buy, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robmary J.

customer_reviews.title: Must have item!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! We use it to warm up bottles at home and on the go. I looked at many different products but chose this one as it does not require batteries, hot packs, or a car outlet. I can pour in the hot water and heat up the bottle anywhere, allowing me to feed my son at church without missing the sermon. I will probably purchase again for baby shower gifts. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ConscientiousMomma16

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn’t stay hot. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The one job this flask has is to keep water hot but it doesn’t. After 3 hours the water goes from boiling to lukewarm. The cover that you use to pour from is faulty and water spills all over the place- as if having a baby doesn’t give you enough cleaning up to do. Don’t waste your money on this junk. Buy a regular thermos flask instead.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kanhai (Terry K)

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for warm milk on the go
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who has babies who refuse to drink cold milk (be it breast milk or formula), this is a must! It holds 16 ounces of hot water, and it keeps the water hot for hours. Yes, it takes up space in the diaper bag. And, yes, it is a little heavy when it's full. But, it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing idea!
customer_reviews.text: We took it on our trip to Europe and it was amazing! No need to think about electricity or batteries. You only need a bit of hot water and everyone is willing to give you hot water without hesitation. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: For the love of cooking

customer_reviews.title: MUST ADD TO BABY REGISTRY. Perfect for BF pumping mamas on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this is a MUST GET. Put this on your registry ASAP. I was having difficulties because my LO wouldnt drink my pumped milk cold and when were on the go, its difficult to warm. A friend suggested this and HONEY, this did not dissapoint. Its so clutch for a day out and it actually stays warm after HOURS and HOURS. Love this thing, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! It constantly leaks, we had hot water everywhere each time we used it and burned ourselves a couple times when the hot water would spill out, NOT something you want near your baby! Yes, we made sure we were using them correctly and we had a couple of these, BOTH leaked. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camp's mechanism
customer_reviews.text: It's been nearly six months since I purchased this product. When I pour the water out, it doesn't stop. When I push the stopper on the top, it seems stiff. Everytime that happens, when I open the cap, the back has come off and into the water. The mechanism is undone already in less than six months. I loved it when it was working. It was convenient, it the water hot 24 hours but now it's a bit inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Essie

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced thermos
customer_reviews.text: This is literally just a thermos with a lid that you pour the hot water into to set your bottle in the water. It takes quite a long time to heat this way. When I took it to church with me, my son ended up kicking it over and spilling the water all over the carpet. You absolutely could not use this in the car. I have returned mine as I was looking for a quick and convenient way to warm milk but it was not the solution for me. I could have used a much cheaper thermos had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Does what its it's meant to do all th way !!
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect ! Keeps water hot like its supposed to . The depth of it its perfect you dont have to worry about burning yourself and man that thing seals real good not one single drip come out can even leave it upside down and nothing will get wet i have accidentally tipped it and nothing wet .! Just that for freezer milk you'll need to get a second batch of hot water if you're trying to give baby a little more warmer milk.. But no more can i get a Hot cup of water please this has saved the day !
customer_reviews.author: Aemee Solis

customer_reviews.title: You can use this at night, during the day, for your nanny too
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I use mine when traveling and overnight. I boil my water early and pour it into the thermo. This gives it time to cool down. I like to use the water from the thermo for my babies bottle since he’s really picky about bottle temperature. If the water is too hot, I use the cover that comes with it for cold water. Let’s face it, it’s much easier to get cold water than hot water. I read others had leaking issues. If you put the top on and press the button there will be leakage. The button needs to stay up. Hope this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Price

customer_reviews.title: So lame...
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this when I was traveling from California to Alaska and almost the entire thing leaked into my diaper bag..so not only did I lose almost all my warm water for my daughter, it got everything inside the bag wet🤦 I ended up throwing it away because I couldn't just keep it with me the rest if the way
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Burned me while using it properly
customer_reviews.text: This bottle warmer was great until it leaked and burned my skin. I reached out to Tommee Tippee customer service (with photos) who told me they cannot help me because I returned it to Amazon. This is a travel device. Therefore, I was using it to travel and had to return it otherwise it would be sitting in my home while I TRAVEL for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S

customer_reviews.title: Leaky thermos
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and the water definitely stays hot but there are a few issues that make it more difficult than it needs to be. 1. It’s pretty bulky, I don’t know why it’s so wide. 2. It’s a pain to get the lid of the thermos to screw on properly. We’ve had many leaks, once pouring entirely out in the diaper bag soaking everything in it. I’ve found it easier to just pack a smaller thermos of warm water and mix the bottles on the go instead of warming up already made bottles.
customer_reviews.author: The Moores

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean. Beware of mold!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to keep milk cold. It did that job great. However, the lid for the thermos is extremely hard to clean! The inside ended up growing mold because there is no way to take it apart and clean it thoroughly. I threw out the whole thing after only about 3 weeks of using it. I was disappointed in the design of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Mznurse

customer_reviews.title: Worked well initially and then fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review: after a few months this thing just literally fell apart - the top part. I didn’t drop it, leave it it the cold, etc. so although it works well initially I would not recommend. Totally would recommend. Works great on the road when we need to heat a bottle quicky. Only takes a few min to get bottle warm. Easy enough to use on the go as well. A parent must of you travel with a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent item! Keeps "hot" the water for many hours... I always had problems where to get hot water for my baby's bottle when travel. Now with this convenient thermos it's a peace of mind. I use the mam anti colic bottle (it's wide) the cup is wide enough for it. Btw it's a little big to fit into my carriage bag so I just keep it next to me in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm giving this two stars because it's a great concept and if you can keep the water in the container it stays warm for long periods of time. But my issue is that it leaks out somewhere and makes a big mess. I was keeping ours in our diaper bag which has a flat bottom so it's usually upright. This thing leaked out 90% of the water (I filled it to the bottom of the neck). It soaked everything in our diaper bag, the seat it was sitting on and when I picked up the diaper bag (not knowing) got me wet. So as I said great concept but ours leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love this for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I put bowling water in it, usually about 2 cups keeps it full and it will last me for about 2-3 feedings. I only use distilled water to keep it extra clean. Once time I forgot to empty it after I got home and the water was still hot the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: Almost Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it's a great product. My only issue is the fact that the cup that you poor the hot water into is very big and not insulted. Because of it's size it doesn't fit into a cup holder so you have to hold it if you're going to be driving or walking around, and because it's not insulated it burns your hand. The cup also poses a large splash or spill risk because the top of the cup is wide open, and with scolding hot water, it probably should have some sort of lid.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda R.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for on the go moms! The PROs are heats bottle quickly, easy to use, makes feeding easier for mom's on the go. One thing this product is great for is late night feedings! Cons are the product is bulky and takes up alot of space in my sons diaper bag, wish there was an easier way to store hot water while you heat it ( like a safety lid?) for children with "busy" hands that like to grab on things. You have to stop what you are doing and find a place to sit while the bottle is warming up..Great while your at restaurant's, Cafe's, grocery shopping/ shopping (as long as there is somewhere to sit).
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have If You Leave the House with Baby (and don't nurse in public)
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be able to go places with your baby, get one of these and an electric hot water kettle. This has made all the difference between a screaming, hungry baby and a happy baby who gets to eat nice warm milk while we are out shopping or at a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: aubieangel

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot!
customer_reviews.text: This thermos stays hot for a REALLY long time. The lid is also extremely simple to lock and does not leak at all. Be sure to read the instructions on how to lock/unlock the lid. It wasn't intuitive for me and I didn't do it correctly until I read the little instructions. This thermos is about the height of the average thermal coffee mug but a fair bit wider. I wouldn't call it "compact" but it definitely fits fine into my diaper bag and works so well that it's worth taking up the space.
customer_reviews.author: Walk2345

customer_reviews.title: Leaks big time
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! Even when closed properly, this thing doesn't just dribble hot water, it pours it out in a stream. I thought other reviewers who mentioned this issue might just be latching the lid incorrectly since the closing mechanism is awkward. Nope. No matter how you latch the lid, water leaks. A lot. I'm keeping it since it still works for warming bottles at home, but it's not practical to throw in the diaper bag like I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This thing ROCKS. I read a ton of reviews before purchasing. When I tested it out for the first time the water stayed hot for 11 hours. Make sure to pay attention to the lock-unlock. Make sure to pour water from the spout into the sink the first time so you know exactly how it will come out. You don’t want to burn yourself with boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: SKYE COX

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bottle warmer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I survived my first child without this! My son HATES cold bottles. This bottle warmer is FANTASTIC! I heat water up for 5 mins in the microwave and it stays hot for hours! Once we heat up the bottle, we put the water back in and it continues to stay warm. Just be careful when pouring hot water in and out. I make sure I am a good distance from my baby so there's no way he will be in contact with the water. This really is a great product! I will be purchasing more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Acarleenb23

customer_reviews.title: This is must to have product if you bottle feeding.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very useful and great quality. I am very happy with this purchase. Very easy to use. Water stays hot for very long time and the plastic vase comes handy when you want to warm milk. It can be used for any further need if not just needed for bottle warmer. Overall a great product and a good quality. May look little bulky at first hand. Can't put in cup holder but that's totally ok I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Priti Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby item!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle warmer! It has saved me in so many situations. Baby hates hates hates cold or room temp milk so I’ve been stuck with a screaming baby and no hot water before this warmer and it is not fun. I originally bought this for a road trip with my two month old. The only complaint I have is that it is really bulky and heavy in the diaper bag. But I don’t leave home without it. I get some hot water from the tea pot and it will still be hot the next day. Great baby item I can’t live without.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hazzan

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle warmer I've ever owned and I've owned a ...
customer_reviews.text: Best bottle warmer I've ever owned and I've owned a few. My son has cancer and we are constantly in and out of the hospital. It makes it super easy to heat up his milk when we are there or when we are out for appts, which is nearly every other day at least. I lost the lid on my org one so I ordered another one and it is just essential to our hospital life.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for keeping my breast milk warm while running errands. I hear up my milk first and then pour it in this thermos. Previously I was using a hydro flask because that's all I had. It definitely didn't keep it warm for long. I only pour 4 oz into this thermos and it keeps it warm for hours. I'm impressed and it's better than what I expected. Definitely worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Water Quite Hot!
customer_reviews.text: As a test...I put 170F water in...three hours later...the water was 152F (this was in an AC-cooled home). UPDATE: Just finished a trip to Florida (20 hours each way). Mr. Tippee performed beautifully. We stopped at McDonald's establishments to get hot water from their coffee machines and the water would warm the bottle in 15 minutes or so (warm enough for our little one anyway). The white plastic portion easily held an 8oz. Avent bottle and scalding hot water while driving. We were not worried about the water sloshing out. Great idea...great product.
customer_reviews.author: nickff

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this for heating up breast milk! Even if I’m not traveling, it heats the milk quick and efficient. Many times our electric bottle steamer makes the milk too hot or too cold. I’m about ready to give up on it and just start using this at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm for day trips .
customer_reviews.text: This is great it is a good value. The water stays hot for many hours.. You can pour some out from the pop top without opening it to keep the heat in.. Be sure to keep it as full as possible as the larger volume of water holds heat better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water hot for several hours
customer_reviews.text: This fit into our diaper bag, though it is fairly bulky. It keeps the water very hot for very long. One time, I had added hot water and didn't need it - the next morning, the water was still warm enough had I needed to use it! As she no longer needs it, I'll probably use the insulated part for coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, but!!! This is a MUST HAVE! No need to worry about finding an outlet! I thought this wouldn’t be sufficient due to price & simplicity. Boy! Was I WRONG! I tested out it the minute I got it. Boiled some water and it stayed BOILING hot for over 6 hours! It warmed 4oz of formula in less than 2 minutes. Perfect for our upcoming 3 hour drive. So happy I purchased this. It fits wide and normal sized bottles perfect. Plus, when our son is out of bottle stage, the thermos will be perfect for hot cocoa in the winter! Seriously. GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: The longest I've had to wait was maybe 5min at that was at nighttime when I had warmed up the water that morning plus my daughter seems to like her bottles on the warmer side
customer_reviews.text: This works! It has kept water hot enough to heat up a bottle for 12 hours. The longest I've had to wait was maybe 5min at that was at nighttime when I had warmed up the water that morning plus my daughter seems to like her bottles on the warmer side. It is kinda big so that can be difficult if your diaper bag is already pretty full. Our diaper bag has a pouch that fits it perfectly so it isn't an issue for us.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Good but difficult to use if you are on the go.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality item, the bottle will keep the water HOT for hours and hours which is awesome. However, it’s not that easy to use when you are on the go. I mainly use this on the car, and having hot water being poured from on thing to another is just a bit more complicated than it sounds. Other than that, it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Travels!
customer_reviews.text: This is close to exactly what I needs for on the go with my infant. Keeps the water hot for hours. I took off one star because of the size. It’s just too bulky, though I understand why (to hold a decent amount of water). Otherwise, this is nearly perfect. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great if not defective
customer_reviews.text: The first one that was sent to me was defective. It was extremely hard to twist the cup component. My cousin has one of these and I knew it wasn’t supposed to be THAT difficult to remove the cup. I literally tried to remove it for 30 minutes with all my strength. I ended up having to call my husband over to help and it was difficult for him. We eventually got it to work but I didn’t want to go through that struggle every time. I exchanged it and the new one that was sent is in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda v

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hot water in the diaper bag, I really loved it to begin with. However the top piece of that keeps the water in has a small button to open and close it, well needlessly to say the button broke rendering the entire thermos useless. I want to give it five stars but I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasantly Surprised

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how long it keeps water hot!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it keeps water hot for at least 12 hours! The design is fine, although to help keep the water as hot as possible while it's warming a bottle, a lid would be perfect - the base (the part that stores the water) itself kinda works, but is pretty wobbly, prone to falling off (I doubt it was designed to do this, but I live in Chicago and the elements conspire to cool everything fast.) Incorporating a tweak to the design, or a dedicated "lid" to make it secure would be A+ in my book.
customer_reviews.author: McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Warm Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love this item... we are forever on the go & making sure my 2months old has a warm bottle is very important to me. The water I can honestly say stays hot for quite a few hours. I love the fact that it has a place where you can warm the bottle & it doesn’t matter the length or width because it has a great size to it.
customer_reviews.author: Prezidential

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I’m one of those moms who have to give their baby a warm bottle. This is perfect for travel. Omg what would I do without this. It keep water warm for hours !!! I pour my daughters water in the thermos, and each time I go to make a bottle I pour out the amount of water I need into the bottle. It’s way faster then putting the bottle into the thermos to warm it up. But whatever works best for u. This will be one of my go to gifts for anyone i know who’s expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big to take along just anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes this appear as a pretty compact way to heat the bottle or food because it is taken with a small bottle inside it. This is very very large! If you put it in your diaper bag expect to lose at lease a quarter or more of your diaper bag depending on the bag's size. It does work, so that's great. I usually put in very very hot sink water in it first while my water boils in the pot then spill out the sink water and add the boiling water. That way the temperature is as high as possible in the warmer vs losing heat to a cooler inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

product_meta.title: Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature Portable Travel Baby Bottle Warmer - Multi Function -  BPA Free
product_meta.description: Tommee Tippee's Travel Baby Bottle and Food Warmer easily heats baby's meal when you are out and about. Works with breastmilk, formula or baby food. Portable and convenient, the thermal travel baby bottle warmer stores hot water, for warming on the go - no external warming source needed. The securely fastened lid protects from leaks and spills, and is BPA and phthalate free. The food and milk warmer's compact design should fit in your baby’s diaper bag, so it is ready to go when you need it. Helping you #ParentOn
feature_bullets: Thermal flask securely stores hot water, for warming on the go
Baby bottle travel warmer is portable and convenient, no electricity needed
The securely fastened lid protects from leaks and spills
The warmer's compact design should easily fit into baby's diaper bag
Designed to hold Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature baby feeding bottles and all standard sized bottles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,491 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
